java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
GrailsRequestContext
public class WebRequestDelegatingRequestContext
extends Object
implements GrailsRequestContext

Delegates calls to a passed GrailsWebRequest instance.

0.6
Author:
Graeme Rocher
